In a message dated 11/26/2005 12:26:02 A.M. Central Standard Time,  
ikkanshi@... writes:

Do  people use oils ?. I have heard of Choji, skin oil ( i.e forehead, 
neck  etc ) and gun oil add to lustre but I find this makes the tsuba 
look a  little artificial. Ok, to stop any active rust I understand but 
if the  Hira is just a little dull and neglected  then.................


in some Japanese text..............I read they use " nose " oil, I assume  
they rub the tsuba on their nose.
 
milt
